duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and execute a comprehensive product strategy and roadmap for EV charging products.
Oversee end-to-end product development across hardware, firmware, mobile, in-car UI, and site design.
Stay at the forefront of EV charging technologies and identify opportunities for technology integration and advancements.
Champion a customer-centric approach to product design and deliver a seamless and intuitive user experience.
Utilize data analytics and market insights to drive informed product decisions and improve product performance.
Ensure EV charging products meet all relevant regulations and certifications.
Collaborate effectively with the Global Charging Team based in Germany to ensure alignment of product strategies.
Lead and inspire a diverse and talented team of product managers, engineers, and technology experts.
Identify strategic partnerships and collaborations with technology providers, utilities, and other stakeholders to enhance EV charging offerings.
Develop and manage budgets for product development and technology initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Technical foundation in Electrical Engineering (BSc minimum) plus product development and management experience in power electronics and embedded software. An advanced degree (MBA, MS) is a plus.
